failure.message:

Your output should contain "The input isn't a 5-letter word. Input a 5-letter word:"

---
Arguments: somewords.txt somecandidates.txt
Words Virtuoso Input a 5-letter word: ?[38:5:10m> trains ?[0mThe input isn't a 5-letter word. Input a 5-letter word: ?[38:5:10m
